name: Soul Harvest (itch) (AngryArugula, KetrinaDrawsALot, Benjamin Nolan / TwoWholeWorms)
name_original: Soul Harvest (itch) (AngryArugula, KetrinaDrawsALot, Benjamin Nolan / TwoWholeWorms)
description:
Click to cause havoc.   Click on souls to harvest them.

Press R to restart if stuck.  Auto-restart if no more souls available.
